summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing potential meeting dates in May 2010. Jes Staley, identified as the CEO of J.P. Morgan, communicates with Epstein regarding travel plans and possible meeting locations in New York and Boston.
